Author: yavibavi
Text: I spent all of today switching between watching youtube to vomiting up everything i put in my stomach.   Sometimes we gotta be out here being kinda pathetic n shit. If it makes you feel any better you're not alone and your loved ones definitely dont hate you.  Being sad and having an eating disorder is not being evil, it's being helpless and needing love and support.  We're not perfect.  Nobody is perfect.  And maybe we're especially imperfect but it's aight dog.  Wishing you the best
